title: Bob’s Discount Furniture Rises 11% After $331 Million IPO
description: Bob’s Discount Furniture Inc., a home furnishings retailer backed by Bain Capital, rose 0.1% in its trading debut after the company raised $331 million in a US initial public offering.
content: Bob’s Discount Furniture Inc., a home furnishings retailer backed by Bain Capital, rose 0.1% in its trading debut after the company raised $331 million in a US initial public offering.
